title: EcoFlow Launched DELTA 2 Max - The Ultimate Portable Power Station to Power Every Day for 10 Years - PR Newswire
summary: EcoFlow launched the DELTA 2 Max, a portable power station with 2kWh capacity and eco-friendly features. The product offers fast-charging, a long lifespan, and supports multiple devices, making it ideal for both home and on-the-go use. EcoFlow also promotes additional renewable energy solutions for powering homes and reducing electricity bills.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 335999 - All Other Miscellaneous Electrical Equipment and Component Manufacturing, 221118 - Other Electric Power Generation, 221119 - Other Electric Power Generation, 335932 - Noncurrent-Carrying Wiring Device Manufacturing

title: EcoFlow Expands European Reach with PowerStream Balcony Solar System and EU Headquarters in Düsseldorf - PR Newswire
summary: EcoFlow has launched a new innovation, the EcoFlow PowerStream, a balcony solar system with a portable power station. They celebrate the opening of their EU headquarters in Düsseldorf by showcasing this new product along with their other innovations.
green_innovation: TRUE. This innovation, the EcoFlow PowerStream, aligns with environmental sustainability goals by offering a balcony solar system that utilizes solar energy to reduce energy bills and provide backup power, thus contributing to decarbonisation and sustainable energy solutions.
business_innovation: TRUE. The article discusses the launch of a new product, the EcoFlow PowerStream, which is a significant improvement in the firm's product lineup, marking their entry into the home solar battery solutions market.
green_product: TRUE. The EcoFlow PowerStream is a green product as it is designed to significantly reduce environmental impact throughout its lifecycle by utilizing solar energy, promoting energy efficiency, and offering sustainable energy solutions for households.
green_process: FALSE. The article focuses more on the introduction of a new green product (the EcoFlow PowerStream) rather than highlighting a specific green process in manufacturing or production.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 335999 (All Other Miscellaneous Electrical Equipment and Component Manufacturing), 221119 (Other Electric Power Generation), 335122 (Commercial, Industrial, and Institutional Electric Lighting Fixture Manufacturing), 335313 (Switchgear and Switchboard Apparatus Manufacturing)
greenwashing: FALSE. The article provides detailed information about the EcoFlow PowerStream, emphasizing its features, benefits, and environmental impact, without making any false or misleading claims about its environmental benefits.
